title: [The Lost Home, Bar]
description: Set before an archway leading to the Lost Home's kitchen, a slim granite bar provides ample room to order food.  The soft, green grass is perfectly manicured, right up to the counter's blue mosaic tile base.  A sweeping, majestic oak's canopy extends beyond the deep, overhanging roof to provide ample shade.

The area is dimly lit by a set of wrought iron torches.  Set before an archway leading to the Lost Home's kitchen, a slim granite bar provides ample room to order food.  The soft, green grass is perfectly manicured, right up to the counter's blue mosaic tile base.  A sweeping, majestic canopy from the oak in the patio's center extends beyond the deep, overhanging roof.

Set before a marble archway leading to the Lost Home's kitchen, a slim granite bar provides ample room to order food.  The soft, green grass is perfectly manicured, right up to the counter's blue mosaic tile base.  A sweeping, majestic oak's canopy extends beyond the deep, overhanging roof to provide ample shade.
